title: Academic Stress Management and Self-Directed Learning Competency Development for Nursing Students

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing theory and practical experience
context.additional_context: Mobile-based short-term course for working nursing students, requiring learning activities designed around smartphones in limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Identify three or more primary causes of academic stress and explain situational coping strategies.
Diagnose personal psychological resilience levels using the Connor-Davidson Resilience Scale (CD-RISC) and establish improvement plans.
Analyze Self-Directed Learning Readiness Inventory (SDLI) results and propose actionable strategies to enhance learning efficiency.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
